thread.section_title: Hotel De Buci by MH - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Stunning location, beautiful room!
thread.title_full: Stunning location, beautiful room! - Review of Hotel De Buci by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: rswedbergh
title: Stunning location, beautiful room!
text: Everything you want to believe about the beauty and romance of Paris can be found right here. The room is perfect, the view onto the street is nothing short of picture-perfect. The hotel staff are exceptional. The Lourve is a short walk away and cafes line the streets. You simply won't be disappointed!
